title: Relax
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Armenian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Clearly labeled vegetarian & vegan menu options. Daily specials. Separate lunch & dinner menus. Uses seasonal fresh vegetable. Has vegan tapas such as flavored salads, spinach rolled in Armenian bread, bozbash Armenian stew served in a clay pot (potatoes, rice, carrots, courgettes, aubergine & onion), mushroom & spinach or lentil Russian blinis, imam bayeldi, various rice & salad dishes, bakhlava & dessert blinis. Armenian coffee served. Lovely decor and atmosphere. Located on the seafront.
